featured.text: In fact, it is nearly impossible to release captive-bred animals.
Instead of punishing Willig, the city treated him as a hero who attempted the impossible and met the challenge. 34.
It's next to impossible for me to finish the homework in three days.
Sometimes it is impossible to deliver all the mail that arrives at the post office.

definition.en_def: Not able to occur, exist, or be done.
definition.example: It seemed impossible to finish the project in just one week.
